alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Orange; Washington; Western Addison; Western Rutland; Western Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 4:32AM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Essex, western Orange, Addison, northern Rutland, northwestern Windsor and southwestern Washington Counties through 530 AM EDT... At 432 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Huletts Landing, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Middlebury, Rutland, Crown Point, Cornwall, Braintree Hill, Sudbury, Weybridge, Salisbury, Websterville, Lincoln, Orwell, Pomfret, Benson, Chittenden, Whiting, Granville, West Castleton, Tunbridge, Hancock and Shoreham. This includes Interstate 89 between mile markers 14 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Addison; Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Orange; Washington; Western Addison; Western Rutland; Western Windsor
